85998.summary: Some customers in the Hastings-Sunrise area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
85998.title: Jan 10 - Vancouver (Hastings-Sunrise) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
